name: Pillows Grand Boutique Hotel Maurits at the Park - Small Luxury Hotels
description: Pillows Grand Boutique Hotel Maurits at the Park - Small Luxury Hotels is located in the Oosterpark in a former monumental university building, next to Tropenmuseum. Go on a culinary journey at VanOost Restaurant, enjoy a tasteful lunch in the lively Spring Cafe Brasserie, or start or end the night with an aperitif in Fitz’s Bar. Popular points of interest nearby include Royal Theater Carré, Dutch National Opera & Ballet and Rembrandt House. Attractions in the area include Rembrandtplein, 1.6 km away, or Flower Market, situated 1.9 km from the property. - Heineken Experience is 2 km from Pillows Grand Boutique Hotel Maurits at the Park - Small Luxury Hotels. Schiphol Airport is 12 km from the property. The hotel offers parking. The concierge can offer helpful tips for getting around the area. Extended breakfast is served every morning in Spring Café Brasserie. The rooftop bar is the perfect summer destination with a wide view over the Oosterpark. It is a lovely private space for events as well. Fitz’s on the Roof opens when it is 20 degrees celcius or more. All rooms are equipped with a hand steamer (for clothes). The maximum occupancy per room is two adults at Pillows Grand Boutique Hotel Maurits at the Park. It is possible to reserve connecting rooms. The hotel offers secured underground parking with charging points for electric vehicles.

name: The Dylan Amsterdam
description: Boutique hotel The Dylan is set along the Keizersgracht canal, in the heart of Amsterdam. Dam Square is a short walk away. The on-site restaurant Vinkeles, located in an 18th century bakery, has Two Michelin stars, and there is the more casual dining establishment, Bar Brasserie OCCO, on-site as well. The Dylan offers different rooms and suites, some of them specially designed by Studio Linse and Remy Meijers, a well-known Dutch designer. All have luxurious bathrooms, a bathrobe and slippers. There is free Wi-Fi. The Dylan has a fitness centre, a massage service and a garden with terrace. There is a lounge and bar to relax. The Nine Streets shopping area can be found around the corner for guests who enjoy boutique shopping. All major sights are within walking distance. Trams, buses and metro stops are only minutes away.

name: Sofitel Legend The Grand Amsterdam
address: Oudezijds Voorburgwal 197, 1012 EX Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Located between two historical canals in the heart of the city, The Grand boasts a rich history; from a 15th-century convent to royal lodgings, to the headquarters of the Admiralty to the City Hall of Amsterdam. The hotel offers five-star luxury in a unique ambiance, furnished with French elegance and grandeur. The spacious accommodations, the exceptional food and beverage proposition, the historic meeting/event venues and the indulgent Sofitel SPA captivate and seduce everyone into visiting this hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel
description: Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel has a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Badhoevedorp. This 4-star hotel provides a spa experience, with its sauna and spa centre. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, an ATM and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a vegetarian or halal breakfast. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel. Vondelpark is 8.3 km from the hotel, while Van Gogh Museum is 9.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 3 km from Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel.

name: Steigenberger Airport Hotel Amsterdam
address: Stationsplein Zw 951, CE 1117 Schiphol, North Holland
description: This beautiful 4-star hotel with 440 luxury styled hotel rooms, is located in the non-flying zone and next to the Amsterdam Forest. The complimentary Shuttle Service brings you from-and-to Schiphol Airport in only 8 minutes. Relax (free of charge) in the Lifestyle Club & Active Spa with the most beautiful indoor heated swimming pool, steam bath, sauna, solarium, relaxation area and 24/7 fitness room. The unique Sports & Media Bar (open 7 days per week for lunch, drinks and dinner) offers a wide range of international dishes. While enjoying, you can watch sports events from all over the world displayed on large television screens. In the Trattoria (open Monday-Friday for dinner, as from 18:00 hours) you can enjoy traditional Italian dishes combined with beautiful wines. The most delicious coffees with homemade pastries will be served in our Coffee & Wine Lounge and the most luxury breakfast buffet with a wide range of fresh products will be served in our Patio Restaurant every morning. This hotel is also the perfect location for large international meetings & events. All 15 multifunctional modern conference rooms (with capacity up to 620 persons in Theatre style and all equipped with high-tech facilities) have natural daylight and are located on the ground floor. The large foyer area is accommodated with welcome desks and ideal for stands or coffee breaks.Official Hotel Information

name: Hilton Amsterdam Airport Schiphol
address: Schiphol Boulevard 701, 1118 BN Schiphol, North Holland
description: Hilton Amsterdam Airport Schiphol is unlike any other airport hotel. Visionary and inspirational, its breathtaking design redefines what an airport hotel should be. Directly connected to the international airport terminal of Amsterdam Airport Schiphol via a covered walkway, the hotel is an ideal base for guests catching a flight or visiting the cosmopolitan city of Amsterdam. The railway station inside the terminal provides easy access to the city center in just 15 minutes. The stylish guest rooms and suites boast unique diamond-shaped windows, curved walls and Dutch art. Work comfortably at the ergonomic desk, check your emails with complimentary WiFi and refresh in the spacious bathroom. Upgrade to an executive room or suite for Executive Lounge access. Fresh, bold and surprising are worthy descriptions for the modern Bowery Restaurant with three open kitchens offering Asian & Grill dishes and the stylish Axis Lobby & Cocktail Bar with a wide selection of gins and jenevers. Thrive at the 24-hour fitness center, also offering a sauna and steam room. The first and second floors of this hotel function as an extensive meeting and conference center. It offers 1800 sq. m. of naturally lit flexible event space including a grand pillar less ballroom. A 15-minute train ride takes you from the railway station at Amsterdam Airport Schiphol to the heart of Amsterdam, where you'll find famous museums like Rijksmuseum and Hermitage, great nightlife, colorful markets, lots of retail, and dining options. Take a boat tour of the city's meandering canals or visit the historic former brewery at The Heineken Experience. A little farther away, you find Zandvoort with its sandy beaches, trendy beach bars, and family activities. Or visit the Zaanse Schans, Dutch history full of windmills, handicraft shops, and museums. In Spring, the famous Keukenhof, one of the world’s largest flower gardens, is a must see.Hilton

name: Andaz Amsterdam Prinsengracht - A Concept By Hyatt
description: Set in Amsterdam’s former public library in the heart the canal belt, lifestyle hotel Andaz Amsterdam Prinsengracht - a concept by Hyatt offers elegant design rooms with free WiFi. The Jordaan area and Museumplein are within a 15-minute walk and Negen Straatjes is just 120 metres away. The hotel's interior is designed by famous Dutch designer Marcel Wanders and the rooms and suites feature views over Amsterdam’s canals, the hotel’s landscape garden or the interior lobby. All rooms feature a seating area with flat-screen TV, a minibar with complimentary drinks and snacks and coffee/tea making facilities. The rooms feature an open bathroom concept, with closed shower and toilet, but an open vanity table. Bathrobes and free toiletries are provided. The on-site restaurant Bluespoon serves breakfast, lunch, dinner, as well as a Sunday brunch. Dishes are European with a creative twist and all ingredients are local and seasonal, often picked from the hotel’s herb and vegetable garden during the summer. There is also a bar with open bar counter, where guests can lounge with a craft cocktail and overlook the famous Prinsengracht canal. Andaz Amsterdam Prinsengracht has a Spa & Fitness centre where guests can enjoy a massage and make use of the 24-hour gym. Other facilities of the hotel include bike rental, boat tours, valet parking and a babysitting service and event spaces. The Rijksmuseum, Moco Museum and the Anne Frank House are all within 15-minute walk from the hotel. The Vondelpark is a 10-minute walk away. The Leidseplein, known for its many bars and clubs, is 400 metres from the hotel.

name: Mövenpick Hotel Amsterdam City Centre
address: Piet Heinkade 11, 1019 BR Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Spectacular city views and views of the IJ River are just some of the highlights at Movenpick Hotel Amsterdam City Centre, just 20 minutes from Schiphol Airport. All 408 rooms offer great views of the city of Amsterdam. Enjoy dinner in our restaurant or a nightcap in the cozy Lobby and Lounge Bar. Relax in our Lifestyle Studio with fitness room, Finnish sauna, bio sauna, ice fountain and massage room.accorhotels.com

name: Hyatt Regency Amsterdam
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 5-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Amsterdam. Those staying at the property can also make use of complimentary wireless internet. There are a variety of facilities on offer to guests of Hyatt Regency Amsterdam, such as fitness classes, meeting rooms and a concierge. In fine weather, an outdoor terrace provides a nice spot to relax. The rooms at Hyatt Regency Amsterdam are air-conditioned and include a mini bar, a coffee maker and a private bathroom. They all offer an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and an alarm clock. Amsterdam's attractions, including Natura Artis Magistra and Oosterpark, are within easy walking distance of the hotel. The Tropenmuseum, the Hermitage Amsterdam and the Portuguese Synagogue are also found within a 20-minute walk away.Revato

name: Intercontinental Amstel Amsterdam, An IHG Hotel
address: Professor Tulpplein 1, 1018 GX Amsterdam, North Holland
description: The Amstel Hotel is a five-star hotel, characterized by a rich history of genuine hospitality and exceptional luxury. The hotel, with its unique location on the Amstel, received its first guests in 1867 and has since been known for its majestic appearance and homely warmth ever since.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Jakarta Amsterdam
description: Hotel Jakarta Amsterdam is a unique sustainable hotel in Amsterdam at the IJ river, at the former location where ships left for Jakarta. Hotel Jakarta offers 200 luxurious rooms with a Indonesian influenced style. The boutique style hotel offers rooms of 30 m2 with an Indonesian twist. Most of the superior rooms feature a balcony, with panoramic views over the river IJ on one side and looking over the central station on the Waterfront side. Enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner at Café Jakarta or get a drink at sky bar Malabar on the 8th and 9th floor. A Breakfast buffet is served each morning at the property and is included in the rates. Relax in the wellness and swimming pool with views off the river IJ. The hotel is located within 1.2 km of the central station. The main shopping area is 1.5 km away, while Dam square and Royal Palace can be found at a distance of 2.1 km.

name: Swissôtel Amsterdam
description: SwissÃ´tel Amsterdam blends seamlessly with the historic buildings on Dam Square, but behind the 19th-century faÃ§ade, you'll find clean-lined, contemporary interiors and a warm welcome. Tied up in knots from your travels? Enjoy a soothing massage in youraccorhotels.com

name: Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam - Amstel
address: Joan Muyskenweg 20, 1096 CJ Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam - Amstel has opened its doors in October 2018. It offers 4-star accommodation in Amsterdam with fitness facilities and a spa and wellness centre. Centrally located in a prime location in the Oost district. 1.8 km from Amsterdam RAI only a 10-minute ride by metro to Amsterdam city centre. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The rooms vary from 24m2 to 55m2 and are all equipped with a flat-screen TV, a desk and air conditioning. The private bathroom features a rain shower and is fitted with free toiletries. Hotel guests can make use of the the spa and wellness centre including infra-red sauna, Turkish steam bath, wax salon, outdoor pool and Rasul bath. The massage services are available for a surcharge. A live cooking breakfast buffet is served every morning at the property. The in-house a la carte restaurant serves international cuisine. Bar Moqum is the hotel bar where you can enjoy a cup of coffee, have a cocktail and eat a curry, burger or salad. Only a 5-minute walk to the metro Overamstel, Amsterdam Arena and Ziggo Dome are 2.9 km from the accommodation. Schiphol Airport is 11 km from the property.

name: Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel
description: Located within 8.4 km of Vondelpark and 9.2 km of Van Gogh Museum in Badhoevedorp, Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel provides accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and flat-screen TV. Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, private bathroom and a kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a fridge. The aparthotel offers a vegetarian or halal breakfast. The restaurant at Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel serves international cuisine. Guests at the accommodation use the gym or relax in the spa and wellness centre including a sauna, a wellness packages and a steam room. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings and Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel can arrange a bicycle rental service. Moco Museum is 9.3 km from the aparthotel, while Leidseplein is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Schiphol, 3 km from Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Amsterdam City Center
description: Conveniently located, Radisson Blu Hotel Amsterdam City Center offers easy access to Amsterdam's main hot spots. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The hotel has a fitness centre with a sauna, cardiovascular equipment and a cross trainer. For a quick and effortless check-in and departure experience, guests can take advantage of the express check-in/check-out feature. Radisson Blu Hotel Amsterdam City Center features rooms equipped with converters/voltage adaptors, tea and coffee making facilities and cable/satellite channels. They feature blackout curtains, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. Radisson Blu Hotel Amsterdam City Center provides an on-site bar, De Pastorie, which serves a variety of beverages in a cosy setting. Lunch and dinner are available daily at De Palmboom. Guests are also able to try one of the many bars and restaurants in the surrounding area. The hotel is close to Nieuwmarkt Metro Station, making it easy for guests to discover Amsterdam and its surrounding areas. The local area is also well known for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: W Amsterdam
description: A stay with us is immersive. A place that embodies the city's cool, creative, cutting-edge spirit. Flowing through two unique buildings - a former telephone exchange and a bank. Life in this city with W is a bright blend of historic Dutch architecture wrapped in avant garde design. Set aside Dam Square for an unrivalled stay in the heart of Amsterdam’s vibrant energy. A highlight of luxury in our 238 stylish guest rooms, including 23 suites, 3 WOW suites, and 2 more Extreme WOW Suites. Indulge in culinary delights at our destination restaurants doubling as design favorites, THE DUCHESS and MR PORTER. Sip signature cocktails at our rooftop W Lounge, overlooking the Royal Palace and city lights, with an iconic rooftop pool, WET Deck.With our Whatever/Whenever service, W Insiders and W Happenings, you'll have exclusive access to Amsterdam's vibrant nightlife, dining, shopping and fashion scene throughout your stay. A unique blend of heritage and contemporary style awaits.Marriott

name: De L'Europe Amsterdam
address: Nieuwe Doelenstraat 2-14, 1012 CP Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Founded on the remains of a late medieval fortress, De L'Europe Amsterdam offers luxurious accommodation along the Amstel River, in the heart of the city. This 5-star hotel includes a fitness area, spa and wellness facilities and a waterside terrace. Valet parking is available at an additional charge. The guest rooms and suites blend a classic design, including a Carrara marble bathroom, with contemporary amenities such as Apple TV, A Bose surround sound system and motion detecting floor lighting. A nespresso machine and international adapters are also featured. Some rooms and suites offer a balcony overlooking the Amstel and historic centre of Amsterdam. Dutch Masters replicas are displayed in each room in partnership with the Rijksmuseum. De L’Europe includes the fine-dining restaurant Flore with 2 Michelin Stars and a Green Star and a brasserie named Marie which serves French cuisine. The iconic Freddy's Bar offers cocktails and gourmet snacks accompanied by live piano music. Both restaurants and the bar overlook the Amstel and the city centre of Amsterdam. In addition, a luxurious wellness center, Le Spa by Skins Institute compliments the hotel. Luxurious body treatments and sublime skincare are offered using only organic ingredients under the care of professional therapists. The wellness centre boasts saunas, a swimming pool and a fitness studio with 'technogym' cardiovascular and resistance equipment. Dam Square is less than a 10-minute walk away. The Flowermarket is only 200 metres away and Foam is 500 metres. The nearby Spui tram stop gives easy access to Amsterdam Central Railway Station and Museum Square.

name: Pestana Amsterdam Riverside
description: This luxury 5-star hotel situated in a monumental building, the former Town Hall and Archive of the Amstel Community. Located near the Albert Cuypmarkt street market this hotel features a variety of facilities including a restaurant, a fully equipped fitness centre, spa and massage services. Pestana Amsterdam Riverside provides rooms with air conditioning. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All 154 luxury bedrooms and suites located in the Town Hall, Archive Building offer a flat-screen TV and coffee and tea facilities. Each building gives its own identity to the rooms and suites. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Pestana Amsterdam also offers 16 studios equipped with a kitchenette. Some rooms offer a river view and feature a private bathroom with a bath. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast area. ARCHIVE by Pestana restaurant has a patio garden at the hotel. There is an in-house bar and guests can also make use of the business area including 10 meeting rooms. The wellness area in the hotel includes 2 types of saunas, an indoor swimming pool and treatment of massage can be booked for complete relaxation. Speaking Portuguese and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Parking is available on-site. Heineken Experience is a 18-minute walk from the property, while Carre Theatre is a 12-minute walk away. Hermitage Amsterdam is 1.4 km from the property while Rijksmuseum and Stedelijk museum are only 1.7 km away.

name: NH Collection Amsterdam Barbizon Palace
address: Prins Hendrikkade 59-72, 1012 AD Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Spread over nineteen 17th century houses, NH Collection Amsterdam Barbizon Palace offers stunning architecture. Situated right in the center of Amsterdam, the Royal Palace, shops and restaurants are only steps away. For the Van Gogh Museum, take a 10-minute tram ride. It is also opposite Central Station, providing direct links to the airport and the rest of the city. With 268 rooms, NH Collection Amsterdam Barbizon Palace features classic décor. The rooms are spacious and many have a beautiful city view. Connecting rooms and apartments are available, and climate control comes as standard throughout. Luxurious breakfasts are served at Hudson’s Terrace & Restaurant, where guests can also enjoy an à-la-carte menu in the afternoon and evening. The true culinary highlight of the hotel is Restaurant Vermeer which is led by Chef de Cuisine Chris Naylor. For something special, the hotel also has a private boat dock and can organize boat tours and floating dining. There is also a bar, gym and wellness area including sauna and steambath. NH Collection Amsterdam Barbizon Palace is the perfect venue for weddings, meetings and special events. The conference center is unique, situated in St. Olaf’s 15th century chapel. There are dedicated event planners and 12 meeting rooms.NH Hoteles

name: Art'otel Amsterdam
address: Prins Hendrikkade 33, 1012 TM Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Located in the heart of Amsterdam opposite central station and within walking distance of Amsterdam's main attractions, local museums and shopping areas. The hotel's modern rooms all feature artwork by Atelier Van Lieshout and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Each room comes with mood lighting and flat-screen TV. The bathroom boasts a rain shower, separate toilet, and Elemis guest amenities. Hairdryer, luxurious bathrobes and slippers are provided. There is a mini fridge and an illy espresso machine in each room. Guests can enjoy a classic breakfast buffet in the restaurant with a few new additions from ARCA restaurant & bar with Portuguese influences. ARCA Restaurant & Bar is the perfect spot for a memorable dining experience offering modern Portuguese dishes with unique Asian influences, impressive cocktails and lively weekend nights. Amsterdam’s well-known canals are a few minutes away from this hotel and many attractions such as the Anne Frank House, Jordaan, Negen Straatjes and Dam Square with its Royal Palace are all within walking distance. Rijksmuseum and the Leidesplein and Rembrandtplein areas are easily accessible by tram.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Amsterdam Airport
description: Find rest and productivity at Courtyard Amsterdam Airport. Conveniently located in Hoofddorp just minutes from Amsterdam Schiphol Airport, our hotel offers excellent amenities and comfortable accommodation for business and leisure travellers alike. Arrive at our AMS hotel with ease, thanks to our shuttle service to and from the Schiphol Airport. Our on-site restaurant, Brasserie Courtyard, serves hot breakfast options, craft cocktails and an all-day dining menu. Business travellers in Amsterdam love our hotel's event facilities, featuring 10 flexible function rooms, as well as unbeatable access to other business and corporate centres in Hoofddorp, AMS. At the end of a productive day, settle into one of our sleek hotel rooms or suites, boasting plush bedding, ample natural light, modern décor and premium entertainment options, including flat-screen TVs with Chromecast. Whether you are visiting for business or pleasure, Courtyard Amsterdam Airport offers all you need to maximize your stay.Marriott

name: Waldorf Astoria Amsterdam
description: Waldorf Astoria Amsterdam is situated along the picturesque Herengracht canal, spanning six 17th and 18th century canal palaces. Located in the in the UNESCO-listed city center, experience our Sincerely Elegant Service to make your stay truly unforgettable. Pamper yourself with personalized treatments at our Guerlain Spa or indulge in all-day dining at Peacock Alley, featuring its renowned Afternoon Tea. For an exceptional culinary experience, savor the exquisite dishes of Two-Michelin-starred restaurant Spectrum. Unwind at our Vault Bar, where expertly crafted cocktails and a cozy ambiance awaits you. For any occasion, our exquisite venues and exceptional service are at your disposal to host a tailored event that exceeds expectations.Hilton

name: Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam Zuidas
address: Tommaso Albinonistraat 200, 1083 HM Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam Zuidas -Rai has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and spa and wellness centre in Amsterdam. The property is set 280 metres from Amsterdam RAI, 3.8 km from Van Gogh Museum and 3.8 km from Moco Museum. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the hotel. At Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam Zuidas -Rai guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. Rijksmuseum is 3.9 km from the accommodation, while Vondelpark is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 13 km from Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam Zuidas -Rai.

name: Van Der Valk Hotel Oostzaan - Amsterdam
description: Situated in Oostzaan, 10 km from Amsterdam, the new Van der Valk Hotel Oostzaan - Amsterdam offers free private parking and free WiFi. There is a casino on site as well as an à la carte restaurant. Guests can take a refreshing plunge in the heated indoor pool on the 6th floor, where a sauna with panoramic views and a gym are also featured. The hotel boasts air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. All rooms have a walk-in rain shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. Superior rooms boast a bubble bath. Each room comes with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and bike rental is available. Enjoy a drink at the hotel bar or relax in the wellness area. Guests can enjoy live cooking on Saturdays and a brunch on Sunday. Zaanse Schans is 10 km away, while Haarlem is 17 km from the property. Amsterdam Central Station is 10.8 km from the accommodation. Dam Square is 12 km km away. Schiphol Airport is 15 km away.

name: Corendon Amsterdam New-West, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
address: Aletta Jacobslaan 7, 1066 BP Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Located in one of the emerging, colorful districts of the city, Corendon Amsterdam New-West is the hotspot of the local social scene, where the cultural richness and diversity of the neighborhood is celebrated in style, and everyone feels welcome. With its own parking space and conveniently close to city center, our hotel is steps away from tram line 2 passing through the landmarks such as Vondel Park, Concert Building, Museum Square, Dam Square and Central Station as well as the metro lines bringing you to RAI Convention Center and giving connections to Schiphol Amsterdam Airport. Whether you are travelling for business, visiting Amsterdam, or enjoying a weekend getaway, our 263-rooms stylish hotel is the perfect base for you. Serving a menu inspired by Caribbean and South American cuisine, our restaurant, Mondi New-West promises an eclectic and refreshing dining experience. Our Vitality Spa & Fitness spreading over 1000 m2 offers a luxurious wellness experience along with a gym open around the clock.Marriott

name: Moxy Amsterdam Houthavens
description: Hey Gorgeous, welcome to Moxy Amsterdam. Our hotel is a stylish oasis in Houthavens, Amsterdam’s oldest working harbor. It is a perfect place to relax, socialize or run your empire, with easy access to the city centre. Check-in is at the bar where we serve food and drinks 24/7. With epic views, our 19 sqm cozy rooms are modern and smart designed with an industrial vibe. The best selfies guaranteed from our floor-to-ceiling windows (natural lighting always best), there are spacious walk-in showers, furiously-fast & free Wi-Fi, and 43” Smart TVs with Chromecast. Moxy offers everything you want and nothing you don’t. You will love our neighborhood. There are ships of all sorts, superb waterfront strolls, great restaurants, and a community of creatives and designers on our doorstep. The city centre is a short bike-ride or bus ride away when you fancy the big-ticket Amsterdam experience.Marriott

name: Hotel & Wellness Zuiver
description: Enjoy a healthy and relaxing stay at this luxurious hotel in Amsterdam. Hotel & Wellness Zuiver provides a convenient base for walking and cycling in the Amsterdamse Bos. The property offers a spa and wellness centre for guests' comfort. With both modern guest rooms and luxurious suites, you can choose suitable accommodation for your trip. Weather permitting you can sit out on the terrace with a drink from the bar and enjoy the sun. The property has arranged Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday as swimwear day and wearing swimwear is mandatory. On all other days, it is not permitted to wear swimwear. With a 24-hour front desk, Hotel & Wellness Zuiver enables you to come and go as you please. Make use of the good public transport links into the city centre or take a 10-minute bicycle ride to explore Amsterdam.

name: Jaz in the City Amsterdam
address: De Passage 90, 1101 AX Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Jaz in the City Amsterdam offers accommodation in the Zuidoost district of Amsterdam. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. Each spacious room includes a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Jaz in the City Amsterdam offers 24-hour front desk service. Event venue Ziggo Dome and the Amsterdam Arena are in the property's direct vicinity. Amsterdam RAI Convention centre is at 5 km distance, while Schiphol Airport is 12 km away. Public transport will take guests to the city centre within 15 minutes.

name: Maashotel Rotterdam Centre
description: Find us in the center of Rotterdam, with a metro and tram stop right outside our front door. Take in the sunset from the Erasmusbrug bridge which is just a few minutes away. Enjoy views from Euromast which is under 2 kilometers from us. We offer a wellness club which includes a heated indoor pool and fitness room. Nine meeting rooms are available.Hilton

name: Mainport Hotel Rotterdam
description: We’re located on the banks of the river Maas, offering sweeping views of the water and skyline. Discover attractions like The Museum Boijmans van Beuningen and Markthal, both less than a kilometer from us. We are next door to the iconic Erasmusbrug, the perfect spot for a Rotterdam sunset. Our hotel has a waterfront terrace and private jetty accessible for water taxi pickups.Hilton

name: Carlton Oasis Hotel
description: Carlton Oasis Hotel is located in Spijkenisse,the largest city on the island of Voorne-Putten in South Holland. Get free access to the Carlton Sport sport centre. All rooms have coffee and tea facilities, a TV and free unlimited secured Wi-Fi access. Carlton Oasis Hotel has a restaurant for snacks, a complete dinner or a cold beer. The fitness area, the indoor swimming pool, the sauna and the Turkish steam bath are all freely accessible to guests. The hotel is a 30-minute drive away from Rotterdam and Zeeland. With 35 km of coastline, beautiful nature and characteristic villages this part of the country is beautiful for walks. Hotel Carlton Oasis offers free parking facilities.

name: Bastion Hotel Maastricht Centrum
description: Bastion Hotel Maastricht Centrum offers air-conditioned rooms, underground parking and free Wi-Fi in the historic centre of Maastricht. It includes a fitness centre and is only 750 metres from the Vrijthof. The rooms at Bastion Hotel Maastricht Centrum benefit from a minibar, coffee and tea facilities. They also feature a work desk and an LCD flat-screen TV. The restaurant serves international à la carte dishes for lunch and dinner and there is a bar for drinks. Maastricht Railway Station is less than a 20-minute walk from the hotel. The centre of Valkenburg, featuring the castle and famous Velvet Cave, is 15 minutes’ drive away. Maasmechelen Outlet shopping village is less than 25 minutes away by car.

name: NH Maastricht
description: The NH Maastricht hotel neighbors the Maastricht Exhibition and Congress Center. A modern style hotel, NH Maastricht is a 30 minute walk from Maastricht Randwyck train station and nearby city center. Focused on providing the perfect stay for our guests, there are several local attractions nearby including the Helpoort, an ancient city wall now turned into a museum, and the Onze-Lieve-Vrouwe Basilica, a historical Romanesque church. For culinary options, the restaurants near NH Maastricht offer everything from a café serving soup and salad, Friture - Restaurant Reitz, to modern European cuisine at Beluga. For guests who prefer to dine in, NH Maastricht provides an in-house restaurant. Seasons serves international cuisine in a welcoming atmosphere and offers vegetarian and children’s options. For breakfast, the perfect stay is enhanced by a breakfast buffet or cooked to order hot dishes. Within our selection of comfortable rooms there are flat-screen TVs, free Wi-Fi, and tea or coffee makers. Larger rooms are available and include sitting areas, minibars or offices and dining areas. NH Maastricht hotel has 9 meeting rooms and a beauty salon, gym, sauna, steam bath and spa are but a few of the extra features we provide for a unique and memorable experience.NH Hoteles

name: Van der Valk Hotel Maastricht
description: This hotel is set on the edge of Maastricht's historic centre, just off the A2 highway. It features fitness facilities, a indoor swimming pool and sauna area and three fine dining restaurants. Parking in front of the hotel is free of charge for guests. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Hotel Van der Valk Maastricht has spacious hotel rooms with a seating area, box-spring beds, flat-screen TV and work desk. Most rooms have a bath and a separate shower, and free toiletries are provided. The hotel offers an à la carte restaurant, a live cooking restaurant and a bar/brasserie. During warmer weather guests can relax on the terrace. Guests also have free access to the luxury wellness centre that includes an indoor swimming pool with built-in whirlpool, 3 saunas, a cooling down area with rain shower and a relax room. The Maastricht Exposition & Congress Centre (MECC) is a 5-minute drive away. The bus stop on the opposite of the hotel offers direct connections to Maastricht Central Station and the city centre.

name: Dormio Resort Maastricht
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Dormio Resort Maastricht offers accommodation in Maastricht. Guests can enjoy a meal in the restaurant or a drink at the bar. This city resort is located next to golf club International Golf Maastricht. Free private parking is available on site. All houses offered here, have a flat-screen TV and a seating area where you can relax. Enjoy a cup of coffee from your terrace or patio. Every house is fitted with a private bathroom. The Luxury houses feature a whirlpool and a sauna. Free swimming facilities are offered at the on-site swimming pool and gym facilities are available for guests. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including golfing and hiking. Vrijthof is only 4 km from Dormio Resort Maastricht, while Maastricht University is 3 km from the property. Maastricht Airport is 11 km away.

name: Dormio Hotel De Prins van Oranje
description: Situated in Maastricht, Dormio Hotel Prins van Oranje offers an on-site michelin star restaurant with spectacular panoramic views. Guests can also enjoy a meal in the resorts restaurant, Proeflokaal Eten or a drink at the bar Proeflokaal Drinken. Free WiFi is featured. A swimming pool is available. Each room is fitted with a desk and a private bathroom. All guest rooms in Dormio Hotel De Prins van Oranje are offersh a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. The breakfast is served in the Proeflokaal. All guests can use the facilities of Dormio Resort Maastricht including free swimming facilities. The reception at Dormio Hotel De Prins van Oranje can provide tips on the area. The property is set 3.2 km from Basilica "Sint Servaas" at the famous Vrijthof square and 3.6 km from the "Onze-lieve-vrouwe" church and square. Maastricht University is 3.2 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Maastricht-Aachen Airport, 11 km from Dormio Hotel De Prins van Oranje.

name: Hotel Marienhage
description: Built on the historical foundations of the Mariënhage monastery, Hotel Mariënhage features a restaurant, a bar and garden in Eindhoven. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.2 km from PSV - Philips Stadium. The rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel every room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries. Guests at Hotel Mariënhage can enjoy a breakfast buffet, lunch, dinner and evening drinks with light bites. The accommodation offers a terrace. Several unique pieces of art are featured in the hotel. Popular points of interest near Hotel Mariënhage include Holland Casino Eindhoven, DAF Museum and Van Abbemuseum. The nearest airport is Eindhoven Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Pullman Eindhoven Cocagne
description: This Premium hotel is located in the charming heart of Eindhoven, opposite the luxury shopping center De Heuvel and the Muziekgebouw. Pullman Eindhoven Cocagne has 320 stylish hotel rooms and 18 multifunctional meeting rooms for all your meetings and conferences in Eindhoven. For your relaxation the Fit and Spa Lounge with the latest fitness equipment, a Finnish sauna, an infrared sauna, a solarium, a swimming pool and the experience shower. Vestdijk47, a contemporary restaurant-lounge-bar concept.accorhotels.com

name: Crown Hotel Eindhoven
description: Eindhoven is known for its design: The Crown Hotel Eindhoven Centre is similar. This hotel makes you enjoy the inside and outside, as it has modern rooms and spaces with eye-catching artwork on the walls. It is located in Eindhoven’s city center, with just a short walk from the city’s most popular attractions, bars, and restaurants. Every type of stay can be provided in one of our lovely rooms. Whether you're traveling alone, with friends, or with the whole family, our spacious, modern accommodations will guarantee that you have everything you need.Official Hotel Information

name: Westcord Hotel Eindhoven
description: WestCord Hotel Eindhoven is located in the city centre, within 5 minutes on foot from Eindhoven Railway Station. The hotel offers spacious rooms and suites. Part of the hotel is located in the monumental Philips light tower, built in 1909. The rooms are individually designed. A wide variety of shades and patterns combined with hand-picked furniture create a different experience in every room. The loft rooms are located in the light tower and offer a genuine city experience by the 4 meter high ceilings. Guests can enjoy the live- cooking breakfast buffet with a glass of bubbles, lunch or intimate dinner for two in the restaurant. The hotel bar is known for its wide variety of whiskeys and beers. Free Wi-Fi is available to guests in the entire hotel, as well as a parking garage (charges applicable). Philips Stadium is a 7-minute walk. High Tech Campus is 5 km away and Eindhoven Airport is 7.5 km. Efteling is a 30-minute drive and Den Bosch is 20 minutes away by car.

name: Holiday Inn Eindhoven Centre
description: City centre hotel close to Eindhoven train station, with a mini gym and an indoor pool. The central Holiday Inn® Eindhoven hotel is a four-minute walk from Eindhoven train and bus stations. Eindhoven Airport is 20 minutes away by car, and the hotel offers parking for a daily fee. There are six naturally lit meeting rooms including the Plenary Hall with space up to 180 people. Free WiFi is available throughout the building. The High Tech Campus is a 16-minute drive away. It's a 10-minute walk to the Piazza and Heuvel Galerie shopping malls, with a choice of lively bars and restaurants nearby. Eindhoven's design legacy is on show at the Philips Museum, a 10-minute walk from the hotel, while it's an eight-minute bus ride to Van Abbemuseum for modern and contemporary art. Football fans can walk to PSV Eindhoven's home ground in 10 minutes. Modern rooms offer a choice of pillows to ensure a good night's sleep – and kids stay and eat free*. Wake up to a continental breakfast buffet and, later, enjoy a meal in our All Day Dining restaurant. Unwind in the hotel's indoor pool or work out in the 24-hour mini gym, and end the day in Bar the Living.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Van der Valk Hotel Eindhoven
description: Located only 5 minutes’ drive from Eindhoven’s city centre, this hotel offers free parking and free WiFi. An extensive on-site sports centre including an indoor pool as well as fitness facilities are available. The rooms have a modern design and most have large windows opening to the balcony or patio. Some rooms have a spacious seating area and private spa bath facilities. There are 3 restaurants at Van der Valk. Martinus offers an artisan à la carte menu. HET BUFFET offers breakfast, lunch and dinner buffets. Hotel bar OZZO Food & Drinks offers sushi and homemade burgers. The hotel is situated in the lush surroundings of Genneper Park. Eindhoven Airport is 10 minutes away from Van Der Valk by car and the hotel is directly off the A2/A67 highway.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Eindhoven Best
description: Set in Best, 27 km from Brabanthallen Exhibition Centre, Van der Valk Hotel Eindhoven-Best offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Van der Valk Hotel Eindhoven-Best provides certain units that feature a balcony, and rooms come with a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Van der Valk Hotel Eindhoven-Best. The hotel offers 4-star accommodation with a hammam and spa centre. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. De Efteling is 38 km from Van der Valk Hotel Eindhoven-Best, while Landhuis Wolfslaar is 50 km away. The nearest airport is Eindhoven, 7 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Strandhotel Westduin
description: Only 50 metres from the beach, Strandhotel Westduin offers rooms with a French balcony and terrace. There is free Wi-Fi, paid parking possibilities, an infrared sauna and a garden with sun terrace. Each room is warmly decorated and comes with a Nespresso machine. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning. Restaurant Bij Jules serves international à la carte cuisine and seasonal dishes made from organic products. The bar offers drinks, including cocktails, light meals and snacks throughout the afternoon and evening. Strandhotel Westduin is located next to the dunes and beaches. The centre of Vlissingen is 4.5 km away. Middelburg, featuring sights including Middelburg Abbey, is 20 minutes’ drive from the hotel alongside with Zoutelande, Domburg and Veere.

name: Grand Hotel en Résidence De Draak
address: Grote Markt 36, Bergen op Zoom, Noord-Brabant
description: Grand Hotel en Résidence De Draak is located on the central Grote Markt in Bergen op Zoom. All rooms and suite are unique in style and have characteristic details. This accommodation also features a wellness center, is equipped with a fitness studio, a pour on sauna, an infrared sauna and a Turkish bath. Restaurant 1397 serves tasteful, contemporary and innovative dishes with local and worldly influences. The menu changes with the seasons with the finest products of each season. The hotel boasts 34 private parking spots with camera supervision and offers free WiFi throughout. De Draak is a 10-minute walk from the train station. You can take a city tour past the Markiezenhof and the Gertrudiskerk.

name: Carlton President
description: RECHARGE YOUR BATTERIES IN OUR HOUSE FULL OF STORIES, PEOPLE AND IDEAS Our story starts with your wishes. Using influences from nature and the city, Carlton President creates an environment that triggers encounters and the exchange of ideas. We can help you get the most out of your working day we offer healthy food, free flex workplaces and meeting places, attractive conference rooms and luxury hotel rooms. We have thought of everything you need. At the end of the day good ideas make the world a better place! We looking forward to welcoming you to Carlton President, the most central meeting place in the Netherlands.Carlton President, on the edge of Utrecht, provides tastefully decorated rooms equipped with luxurious facilities. You can also use all the hotel facilities such as our restaurant / bar One24, wellness facilities. Don't forget to visit our fitness centre, sauna and whirlpool.This central location (in the middle of the Netherlands), with delicious healthy food and pleasant surroundings, has free Wi-Fi and more than 200 parking places. Carlton President features a free shuttle service to De Wetering, Papendorp, Oudenrijn and Maarssen Train Station. This 4-star hotel also provides free use of both its business center and leisure center which includes a sauna, spa tub and steam bath.The A2 offers easy access to the Jaarbeurs Convention Centre and Schiphol Airport. There is a bus stop 200 m away which has services to the center in 15 to 20 minutes.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Alkmaar
description: Hotel Alkmaar is located on the outskirts of Alkmaar near the A9 motorway and features a 24-hour reception. There is ample free parking in front of the property. Hotel Alkmaar offers rooms with 50 inch TV and a work desk. All rooms are accessible by elevator. Guests can enjoy a daily buffet breakfast. You can also dine in the a Japanese sushi and grill restaurant Kokusai. The hotel offers 5 flexible meeting rooms equipped with a beamer, flip chart and coffee machines. Bike rental is also available. The centre of Alkmaar is easily accessible and is 2 km away. Here you will find the famous Waagplein the the Dutch Cheese Museum. Hotel Alkmaar is 35-minute drive from Amsterdam. Egmond aan Zee and the beach are 11 km away.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Hengelo
description: Located in the beatiful area of Twente, the pleasant Van der Valk Hotel Hengelo offers many recreative possibilities and arrangements. A variety of rooms are available. The 10 multifunctional conference rooms are suitable for meetings, presentations, weddings and personnel parties. Guest benefit from free Wi-Fi access. Because of its ideal location next to the highway (A1), Van Der Valk Hotel Hengelo is very well accessible.

name: Van Der Valk Hotel Utrecht
description: Situated in Utrecht, 3.4 km from Jaarbeurs Utrecht, Van der Valk Hotel Utrecht features accommodation with a bar and private parking. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a terrace. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Van der Valk Hotel Utrecht the rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. At Van der Valk Hotel Utrecht you will find a restaurant serving French, Italian and Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at the hotel. Conference Center Domstad is 4.2 km from Van der Valk Hotel Utrecht, while Museum Speelklok is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 42 km from the accommodation.

name: NH Noordwijk Conference Centre Leeuwenhorst
description: The NH Noordwijk Conference Centre Leeuwenhorst hotel is set in the beautiful tulip field region of Holland, near a long sandy beach. A 10-minute bus ride will take you to the Leiden Central Station and Amsterdam’s Schiphol Airport is just a short drive away. You can also drive to the Noordwijk beach or ride a bike to the Keukenhof gardens. There are 513 rooms at NH Noordwijk Conference Center Leeuwenhorst, many of which offer a lovely views over the surrounding tulip fields which bloom between the end of March and May. The hotel offers a large spread for breakfast each morning. For lunch and dinner, guests can choose from a selection of dishes at our à la carte restaurant. Guests have access to an indoor bowling alley as well as the possibility to rent a bicycle. With its 123 meeting rooms, the hotel is an excellent space for conferences and functions.NH Hoteles

name: Bilderberg Hotel De Bovenste Molen
description: Bilderberg Hotel De Bovenste Molen is situated in a green forest area nearby the city of Venlo. Enjoy the idyllic location, the multitude of wellness facilities and park your car for free. Have a swim in the indoor pool or unwind in the sauna, solarium and Turkish steam bath. Sporty guests can play golf at 1 of the golf courses in the area. The hotel rooms are stylishly decorated and have a private bathroom. Bilderberg offers a healty breakfast buffet each morning. It includes artisan breads, organic dairy, fruits and various juices. Restaurant WOODZ has an inspiring menu with various specialities and fresh ingredients. You can also visit Lounge Bar Mills to have a drink and relax. The garden terrace is available for sunny weather. Around Bilderberg Hotel De Bovenste Molen you can go cycling or walking. Düsseldorf and Maastricht are easily reachable by car. Explore these cities with their exclusive boutiques and charming terraces.

name: Van Der Valk Hotel Zwolle
description: Offering an à la carte restaurant with live cooking, Van Der Valk Hotel Zwolle is located at 6 km from Zwolle. Free Wi-Fi access is available. Rooms here will provide you with air conditioning, a minibar and a seating area. There is also an electric kettle. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a bath and a hairdryer. Extras include a desk, a safety deposit box and ironing facilities. At Van Der Valk Hotel Zwolle you will find a breakfast buffet in the morning. Other facilities offered include a communal lounge and a bar. Guests can make free use of wellness and fitness facilities. The hotel is 6.1 km from IJsselhallen Zwolle, 5.2 km from Stedelijk Museum Zwolle and 5.4 km from Overijssels Centrum Beeldende Kunsten. The property offers free parking and a Tesla charging point.

name: Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin
address: Kon. Astrid Boulevard 5, 2200 AB Noordwijk, Zuid-Holland
description: Facing the beachfront, Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin offers 5-star accommodation in Noordwijk aan Zee and features a fitness centre, garden and shared lounge. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin each room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at the accommodation. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Noordwijk aan Zee Beach is 200 metres from Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin, while Keukenhof is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Mitland
description: With its waterfront location, this hotel offers views of the old De Bilt fortress. Use of the spa facilities, fitness area and swimming pool is free of charge. All modern rooms have air conditioning and private bathrooms with a shower or bath. Most rooms have a balcony. There is a bowling centre, complete with a Music-Thrill-Vision System. Guests can enjoy and relax at one of the several terraces or the surrounding park. The sauna, Turkish bath and recently renovated swimming pool offer a relaxing break during the day. The characteristic à la carte Vlonders restaurant serves dinner on the waterfront. A snack or a drink can be enjoyed at the Brasserie. Hotel Mitland is just over a 5-minute walk to the bus station, from where guests can reach the city centre of Utrecht within 10 minutes by bus.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Nijmegen - Lent
description: Set in Nijmegen, 7.2 km from Park Tivoli, Van der Valk Hotel Nijmegen-Lent offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Van der Valk Hotel Nijmegen-Lent all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving European cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Van der Valk Hotel Nijmegen-Lent features a spa and wellness centre with a sauna. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at the hotel. Gelredome is 13 km from Van der Valk Hotel Nijmegen-Lent, while Arnhem Station is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Weeze Airport, 53 km from the accommodation.

name: Boutique Hotel Steenhof Suites
description: Boutique Hotel Steenhof Suites has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Leiden. Located around 18 km from Paleis Huis Ten Bosch, the hotel with free WiFi is also 19 km away from Keukenhof. The property is non-smoking and is situated 15 km from Westfield Mall of the Netherlands. All rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms have a coffee machine, while some rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. At Boutique Hotel Steenhof Suites each room includes bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Boutique Hotel Steenhof Suites. Madurodam is 22 km from the hotel, while TU Delft is 24 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 27 km from Boutique Hotel Steenhof Suites.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Tilburg
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, Van der Valk Hotel Tilburg is located in Tilburg, 2.7 km from Speelland Beekse Bergen and 2.9 km from Safari Beekse Bergen. Among the various facilities are a casino and a garden. Both free WiFi and private parking are accessible at the hotel. All guest rooms in Van der Valk Hotel Tilburg are equipped with a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a private bathroom and a bath, and selected rooms will provide you with a balcony. The rooms at the accommodation have air conditioning and a desk. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. Van der Valk Hotel Tilburg offers a terrace. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. For any tips on how to get around or what to do in the area, guests can ask at the reception. Naturemuseum Brabant is 5 km from the hotel. Eindhoven Airport is 27 km from the property.

name: NH Atlantic Den Haag
description: Set in the middle of the dunes, NH Atlantic Den Haag is located directly on the Kijkduin beach. Scheveningen, a lovely seaside town, and The Hague city center are only a 20-minute drive away. Conveniently, bus number 24 stops nearby and will take you to The Hague, where you can enjoy sights such as the Peace Palace, Madurodam miniature city and bustling squares. There is also a boulevard dotted with international restaurants along the ocean. NH Atlantic Den Haag offers a choice of 152 rooms with balconies. Most have large windows and some offer views of the ocean. The suites have themed designs, decorated in Asian, Mondrian and honeymoon styles. A fresh breakfast is served daily. Guests can also enjoy a meal with an ocean view at the Gusto Restaurant or head to Atlantic Beach right on the ocean. Some nights there is a live DJ, or unwind with a drink at the Sabor bar. For active travelers, NH Atlantic Den Haag offers bike rentals and a gym. There is also a heated indoor pool, solarium. An excellent choice for functions, there are 19 meetings rooms at the hotel. Free Wi-Fi and parking are available.NH Hoteles

name: Landgoed De Wilmersberg
description: Landgoed de Wilmersberg is beautifully located in a stunning green setting in Twente with free private parking. This 4-star hotel includes a wellness centre, a tennis court and an indoor pool. The hotel rooms are decorated in a romantic theme and come with a Nespresso coffee machine. A rural-style breakfast buffet is served daily in the breakfast room. Guests can make use of the extensive wellness facilities which include a sauna, spa bath and steam bath. There is also a beauty centre which offers relaxing treatments and massages. The restaurant serves regional and seasonal cuisine in elegant modern surroundings and features a sommelier and extensive wine menu. During the winter the open fire provides a cosy touch whilst in summer the picturesque terrace offers open-air dining. De Wilmersberg is ideally situated for many walking routes and cycling trails. The centre of Oldenzaal is just over 5 minutes away by car and Hengelo is less than 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: Carlton Beach
description: This hotel offers rooms with a balcony only 50 metres from the beach in Scheveningen. Carlton Beach includes wellness facilities and and two restaurants. Carlton Beach features rooms with modern bathrooms with a sliding glass door design. Each of the rooms has a refrigerator with various drinks and has a Nespresso coffee machine. Holland Casino Scheveningen is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the famous pier is only 5 minutes’ away. The centre of Den Haag is a 15-minute tram journey away from the Zwarte Pad tram stop which is 50 metres from Carlton. The wellness facilities at Carlton Beach include an indoor swimming pool with a solarium, steam bath and fitness centre. There are also indoor and outdoor saunas plus guests can enjoy a range of relaxing massages treatments. The Beach Brasserie serves light lunch bites and bar snacks in a casual setting with an open-fire of unique design. International cuisine and organic dishes are served in the Smugglers Grill & Bar.

name: Hotel Zuiderduin
address: Zeeweg 52, 1931 Egmond aan Zee, North Holland
description: Located just 350 metres from the beach, Hotel Zuiderduin’s spa includes an indoor pool, 3 saunas and squash facilities. Its rooms have box-spring beds, satellite TV and a balcony. Each room is decorated with warm colours, modern furnishings and a work desk. They come with a private bathroom with free toiletries. Guests can choose from various activities such as bowling, squash or a work-out in the fitness room. There is an extensive playground available for children as well. Hotel Zuiderduin also houses a restaurant which serves international cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The brasserie offers drinks and light snacks through the day. From Zuiderduin Hotel, it’s only 300 metres to Egmond aan Zee’s shopping street. The Sluispolder golf courses are 10 km away. Bicycle rental is also available at the hotel.

name: Fletcher Hotel De Wageningsche Berg
description: Offering a restaurant, Fletcher Hotel-Restaurant De Wageningsche Berg is located in Wageningen at river Nederrijn, on the edge of National Park Hoge Veluwe. Free Wi-Fi access is available. Each room comes with a seating area, TV, electric kettle and coffee machine. The bathroom is fitted with a bath or shower and free toiletries are provided. At Fletcher Hotel De Wageningsche Berg you will find a 24-hour front desk and a garden. Other facilities offered include luggage storage and a laundry. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling. In Wageningen you can find a variety of museums or you can visit Burgers' Zoo, which is a 20-minute car drive.

name: Van Der Valk Hotel Enschede
description: Situated 1.7 km from Holland Casino Enschede in Enschede, Van der Valk Hotel Enschede features a restaurant, bar and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel offers a swimming pool, sport- and wellness facilities. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. Each room comes with a private bathroom. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. A terrace is featured. The hotel also offers bike hire. Naturemuseum Enschede is 1.9 km from Van der Valk hotel Enschede, while Rijksmuseum Twente is 2.7 km from the property.

name: Grand Hotel Karel V
description: Welcome to Grand Hotel Karel V, World Hotel Luxury a historic five-star hotel in the center of Utrecht. Right in the heart of the city, set behind an imposing façade, you will find Utrecht's best-kept secret. Our prestigious hotel is located in a monumental building which used to function as a medieval monastery. This extraordinary location allows you to experience a unique, tailor-made luxury stay with historical charm. Our lush 10,000-square-metre garden offers an oasis of calmness, in which you can relax or can enjoy our terraces. In total, our hotel has 121 rooms, ranging from Comfort rooms to Suites, with beautiful views of the Dom Tower, canals or our courtyard gardens. Our rooms are equipped with all the necessary amenities to ensure that your luxurious stay at our hotel lacks nothing. The importance we attach to sustainability is evident in various ways within both our rooms and entire hotel, which has been awarded Gold Key. Immerse yourself in culinary indulgence at our Michelin starred restaurant, enjoy our sophisticated bistro or relax in our Bar & Lounge. You can also leave all your worries behind in the wellness, complete with an invigorating spa and modern fitness facilities. Whether you would like to dine, stay overnight or host an elegant event: our friendly staff are on hand to make your experience unforgettable. We would like to welcome you into a world where history comes alive and modern luxury surrounds you.bestwestern.com

name: Van der Valk Hotel Heerlen
description: Hotel Heerlen is a luxury 4-star hotel located on the countryside, just 800 metres from the 14th-century Terworm Castle and estate. The property includes an indoor swimming pool and a gym. It also features a wellness area (against a surcharge) with various saunas, an indoor/outdoor relaxation area and an ice lounge. The centre of Heerlen is only a 15-minute walk away. Each room comes with a private bathroom with a bath, shower and toilet. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The modern a la carte restaurant on site serves internationally oriented dishes. Guests can enjoy beverages at the bar. The hotel is only a 3-minute drive from Central Station.

name: Theaterhotel De Oranjerie
description: This luxurious 4-star hotel in Roermond is located in the heart of Limburg. It has an impressive theatre and a number of popular shows. TheaterHotel De Oranjerie offers a range of room types, from comfort rooms to comfort deluxe, executive suites and deluxe suites. Cerise Grand Café serves a variety of drinks, snacks, meals and extensive menu choices. The large lobby area has a few seating areas where you can relax. From TheaterHotel De Oranjerie, the train station of Roermond is only a 2-minute walk away.

name: Golden Tulip Hotel Central
description: The 4-star Golden Tulip Hotel Central is located in the heart of 's-Hertogenbosch, overlooking the medieval market square. It features a brasserie, a private dining room and 2 bars, as well as a fitness centre which offers a unique view of St. John's Cathedral from the top floor. Guests can start their day with a wholesome breakfast in the unique 14th-century vaulted cellar. Part of the Brasserie restaurant, Tony’s Bar offers live jazz music every 1st Friday of the month. The Moriaen Bar provides a warm atmosphere for a drink and a chat. At the end of the day, Brasserie Cé offers international dishes with regional flavours. The hotel is easy to reach by car and public transport. Discounted parking is available at Q-park Tolbrug, directly oppsite the hotel. The central station is only a 7-minute walk away and a bus stop is 50 metres from the hotel.

name: Van Der Valk Hotel Venlo
description: Van der Valk Hotel Venlo offers free parking and free WiFi throughout the entire hotel. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. The spacious hotel rooms have a private bathroom and modern facilities. Van der Valk Hotel Venlo has a children's playground. Because of the hotel's central position to the A67, many of the tourist attractions and cultural sites are easily reached.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Haarlem
description: Van der Valk offers rooms with extra-long beds, satellite TV and balcony only 2 km from Haarlem's city centre. The hotel offers free WiFi throughout. Tesla charging points are available. 'Restaurant Martinus' serves fair, modern but most of all tasteful dishes for every guest. During a business dinner or when going out with the family the menu will be able to serve dish for every occasion. During weekdays the restaurant serves a lunch buffet as well as a la carte, on Sundays a brunch is presented (reservation needed). The key sights of Haarlem, including the Grote Markt and Frans Hals Museum, are less than 10 minutes’ drive from Van der Valk Haarlem. Schiphol Airport is a 15-minute drive from the hotel. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and free public parking is available in front of the hotel.

name: Hotel Haarhuis
description: Located across the main train station and in the heart of Arnhem, Hotel Haarhuis offers a lounge, city spa, fitness, multiple restaurants and free WiFi is available throughout. The highway A325 and the stadium Gelredome are respectively 4 km and 2.7 km away. Each room includes a Smart TV and a private bathroom. Breakfast is served each morning in restaurant LOCALS and includes fresh products, coffee to go and prosecco champagne. Guests can enjoy a drink in the lounge, coffee & sweets in HOEK Coffee & Pastry, enjoy a cocktail on Rooftop Bar BLOU or taste Dutch cuisine in restaurant LOCALS. With the buses leaving from right outside the hotel, tourist sights such as the Dutch National Open Air Museum, the Airborne Museum and the Burgers' Zoo can be reached. Arnhem’s shopping and entertainment district offers many bars and restaurants at a walking distance from Hotel Haarhuis and the Lower Rhine River is within 1 km. The Veluwe area, with its national park, is 10 km away.

name: Alexander Hotel
description: Hotel Alexander is only 200 metres from the beach in Noordwijk aan Zee. It includes free WiFi and the Alexander Beach Club with a panoramic sea-view terrace. Azzuro Wellness Centre is situated next to the hotel and provides free access for guests to an indoor pool plus a Turkish steam bath and whirlpools. The spa offers relaxing treatments including hot stone massage and manicures. There are also tennis and squash courts. Each of the rooms benefits from a balcony and bathrooms including a shower. Alexander Beach Club offers snacks and meals complemented with a refreshing drink. The restaurant at Hotel Alexander serves French cuisine with International influences. The restaurant is open all year round. The main shopping district and entertainment area in Noordwijk aan Zee is less than 200 metres away. Guests can make use of the bicycle rental when exploring the dunes. Amsterdam is a 40-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Van Der Valk Hotel Amersfoort A1
description: Van der Valk Hotel Amersfoort A1 is located just off the A1 motorway, a 10-minute drive from the centre of Amersfoort. It includes free internet and free private parking on site. The stylish rooms have interactive TV, coffee and tea facilities and free internet access. There is a live cooking restaurant and a terrace that offers a comfortable setting on summer days. Refreshing drinks are available in the bar. Van der Valk Hotel Amersfoort A1 offers various private parking facilities. Utrecht is a 25-minute drive away and you can reach Amsterdam within 40 minutes.
